amendatorysection.catchline: Commission; meat processors; contracts authorized; duties.
amendatorysection.para: The commission may enlist as many meat processors as available to participate in the program and shall enter into contracts with meat processors as described in section 37-1508 subject to available funding in the Hunters Helping the Hungry Cash Fund. The commission shall provide forms for donation of deer by hunters and posters for meat processors to advertise their participation. The commission shall provide informational and promotional materials to meat processors regarding the program.
